sentence.Network_en: He wrote a paper which would be published probably at latter Lammas.
sentence.Network_cn: 他写了一篇可能永远也不会发表的论文.

sentence.Network_en: After Lammas corn ripens as much by night as by day.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉马斯节后,庄稼日夜成熟.
